## Introduction
I am an undergraduate student at <a href="http://en.math.nankai.edu.cn/">Nankai University</a> (due on Jul 2026). Previously, I was a research intern (Mitacs GRI) at <a href="https://www.usherbrooke.ca/mathematiques/">Universit√© de Sherbrooke</a> under the supervision of <a href="https://maxencemayrand.github.io/">Maxence Mayrand</a>. Before that, I was an exchange student (tuition free) at <a href="https://cst.temple.edu/department-mathematics">Temple University</a> under the supervision of <a href="https://sites.temple.edu/vald/">Vasily Dolgushev</a>.

My research interest lies in algebra and number theory.
